com.gitblit

Class IStoredSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gitblit.IStoredSettings
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSettings, WebXmlSettings

    public abstract class IStoredSettings
extends Object
    Base class for stored settings implementations.
    Author:
    James Moger

    • Method Detail

      • getAllKeys

        public List<String> getAllKeys(String startingWith)
        Returns the list of keys whose name starts with the specified prefix. If the prefix is null or empty, all key names are returned.
        Parameters:
        startingWith -
        Returns:
        list of keys

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean(String name,
                 boolean defaultValue)
        Returns the boolean value for the specified key. If the key does not exist or the value for the key can not be interpreted as a boolean, the defaultValue is returned.
        Parameters:
        key -
        defaultValue -
        Returns:
        key value or defaultValue

        Parameters:
